tool.name: flat_conslands

param.name: in_CL
param.dialogReference:
Input polygon feature class representing Conservation Lands.

Must include a field called 'BMI', with permissible values "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", or "U".

param.name: out_CL
param.dialogReference: Output feature class with "flattened" Conservation Lands and updated BMI field.

tool.summary:
"Flattens" (eliminates overlaps in) the Conservation Lands feature class. This is necessary to prepare the data as an input to other processes.

The BMI (Biological Management Intent) field is used for consolidation; better BMI ranks (lower numeric values) take precedence over worse ones.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
"Flattens" (eliminates overlaps in) the Conservation Lands feature class. This is necessary to prepare the data as an input to other processes.

The BMI (Biological Management Intent) field is used for consolidation; better BMI ranks (lower numeric values) take precedence over worse ones.
